p: In mice, the infection of keratinocytes was observed in interferon response factor 3 and 7 deficient (IRF3-/IRF7-), but not in wt animals [ 145]. As IRF-3 and -7 are regulatorx of type-I and -III IFNs [ 146, 147], this mouse model supports a role for these antiviral pathways in CHIKV restriction.
